name: sfchronicle
text:
The searing heat and humidity, rain, thunder and lightning thrashing California could be the beginning of the end of the region’s dry Mediterranean climate and a prelude of more surprises to come, scientists say.

name: sfchronicle
text:
The San Francisco Giants, who could have used another arm after running through a lot of its bullpen over the weekend against the A’s, instead recalled outfielder Steven Duggar, a sign they felt that upgrading the outfield defense was an even bigger need.

https://t.co/SsHWkrZa6y

name: sfchronicle
text: Residents in multiple counties flee their homes under mandatory evacuation orders Monday as temperatures soar above 100 degrees and firefighters battle a series of rapidly spreading wildfires sparked by lightning storms — with a threat of more on the way. https://t.co/ZtUY9bedtD https://t.co/JGauyh6pW5
